backend/main.mo: Motoko canister defining game state, dialogue nodes, activities, moments, and player save data with APIs to start and continue games.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence listing implemented features, involved files, components, and test IDs for backend availability checks and operations docs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each frontend file including UI screens, game systems, scenes, minigames, and state management.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS root theme variables and dark mode definitions with base styles for the application.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML entry file defining root container and loading the frontend bundle.
frontend/OPS_CANISTER_AVAILABILITY.md: Developer guide explaining how to keep the canister running, limitations around canister restarts, and operational responsibilities.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component handling startup, navigation, backend availability checks, and orchestrating game launch with diagnostics.
Activity definitions listing gameplay actions, trust effects, completion messages, and optional moment unlocks.
frontend/src/game/audio/useAudio.ts: Zustand-based audio store and hook that initializes looping background music and manages volume, mute state, and playback.
frontend/src/game/characters/Puro.tsx: React Three Fiber component rendering Puro with idle animation and interaction handlers for dialogue and hover effects.
frontend/src/game/controls/MobileControl: Mobile touch overlay providing joystick movement and look controls via touch events for player input.
frontend/src/game/controls/usePlayerCont: Hook combining keyboard, joystick, and look inputs to produce normalized movement and camera delta values.
frontend/src/game/customization/customiz: Static list of customizable room items with descriptions and allowed placement locations.
Defines structured dialogue nodes and choices with trust effects for Puro's branching conversation system.
frontend/src/game/GameView.tsx: Main inâ€‘game view rendering the 3D scene, HUD, panels, mobile controls, and pause/ending flows with initialization hooks.
frontend/src/game/letters/letterTemplate: Generates contextual letter responses based on keywords using predefined friendly, curious, and encouraging templates.
frontend/src/game/minigames/BookSortingM: React UI minigame where players sort books into categories, affecting trust and signaling completion.
frontend/src/game/minigames/DrawingMiniG: A mini-game where players view drawings, adjust trust when viewing each, and navigate between them before completing.
frontend/src/game/minigames/HideAndSeekM: A timed hide-and-seek mini-game where players guess hiding spots, affecting trust based on success or failure.
frontend/src/game/minigames/MiniGameLaun: Launches selectable mini-games and returns to a menu after each one completes.
frontend/src/game/moments/MomentPlayer.t: Displays a narrative moment with title, scene text, and a close button.
frontend/src/game/moments/momentsData.ts: Defines the Moment interface and provides preset story moment data with trust requirements.
frontend/src/game/scene/LibraryScene.tsx: Renders the 3D library environment, handling player movement, camera control, textures, and scene objects like Puro.
frontend/src/game/state/useGameStore.ts: Zustand store managing trust, UI flags, game progress, customization, letters, endings, and related actions.
frontend/src/game/story/endings.ts: Defines ending interfaces and a list of endings chosen by trust thresholds, plus a helper to fetch the appropriate ending.
frontend/src/game/story/EndingScene.tsx: Shows the ending scene based on trust, unlocks it, and provides options to restart or return to title.
frontend/src/game/ui/ActivityMenu.tsx: Renders an activities menu where selecting an activity adjusts trust, completes it, and may unlock moments.
Displays discovered customization items and allows placing them in the library while listing existing placements.
frontend/src/game/ui/DialoguePanel.tsx: Shows dialogue nodes with choices that affect trust and navigate the dialogue tree.
frontend/src/game/ui/LettersPanel.tsx: Allows writing letters and viewing responses, enforcing length limits and generating delayed replies.
frontend/src/game/ui/MomentsMenu.tsx: Lists collectible story moments, showing locked or unlocked states and enabling playback of unlocked ones.
frontend/src/game/ui/PauseMenu.tsx: Provides pause controls, quick-access navigation, settings access, and progress reset confirmation.
frontend/src/game/ui/SettingsScreen.tsx: Presents audio settings including mute and volume controls with a back button.
frontend/src/game/ui/TrustMeter.tsx: Displays the player's trust level with dynamic labels, colors, and a progress bar.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor based on identity, invalidating dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useBackendAvailabilit: Checks backend health status using the actor and exposes availability state and refetch controls.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, loading stored identities and handling login flow.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Wraps game-related backend calls in React Query hooks for fetching state and performing gameplay mutations.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and custom color palette for light and dark themes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the app with React, Internet Identity provider, and React Query client.
frontend/src/startup.ts: Runs one-time startup checks like asset preloading and storage availability, with reset support.
frontend/src/ui/CreditsScreen.tsx: Renders the game's credits screen with description, features, and a back button.
frontend/src/ui/GameLaunchErrorScreen.ts: React UI screen that displays startup/launch failures with optional technical details and retry or back-to-title actions.
frontend/src/ui/GameRuntimeErrorBoundary: React error boundary that catches runtime rendering errors and shows a fallback UI with toggleable stack details and a return-to-title button.
frontend/src/ui/TitleScreen.tsx: Main title screen UI showing game logo, server health warnings, and buttons for starting, continuing, settings, and credits.
frontend/src/utils/launchErrorNormalizat: Utility that parses raw launch errors into user-friendly summaries and categorizes them for display during game startup.
frontend/STARTUP.md: Documentation describing the frontend startup flow, initialization tasks, invocation, and extension guidance.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining theme extensions, colors, animations, and plugins for the frontend.
project_state.json: Project metadata capturing game concept, architecture notes, known issues, and existing implemented features.
